title: Dark Betrayal
description: Brenna yearns to follow her brother to the states. Suddenly her dreams seem within her reach. But what happens when dreams turn to nightmares?Brenna Monaghan is unhappy with her life.He mother is emotionally abusive.Her stepfather gives her the creeps.Her beloved brother is on the other side of the world.She is amazed when she is singled out for a modelling opportunity and transported on a glittering path to fame and fortune.However, is everything really as it seems?Prequel novella to Dark Secrets.
author: Victoria Heap
